hanzi-su-wiki:
術

Значения

Способ, средство; умение; мастерство

Мнемоника

Искусство высевать мак 朮 рядами 行, что облегчает его уборку.

Варианты

术, 朮

method; technique
метод; техника

heisig_chinese_memo: Art is a corrupt line of business in which a blotch of resin on a piece of paper can be brilliant art as long as a few powerful people say so. &nbsp
Keyword_KANJIDIC: art, technique, skill, means, trick, resources, magic
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: искусство, техника, искусство, средства, хитрость, ресурсы, магия
koohiiStory1: Behold the "Boulev´Art" : a life-size section of a boulevard cast in a huge block of resin. Some call it ... art.
koohiiStory2: The definition of art is getting more and more loose these days. Why even some resin spilled onto the boulevard is now counted as art! Hmmph!
jp_example_words:
戦術(せんじゅつ): tactics
美術(びじゅつ): art, fine arts
学術(がくじゅつ): science, learning, scholarship
芸術(げいじゅつ): fine art, the arts
手術(しゅじゅつ): surgical operation
技術(ぎじゅつ): technique
美術館(びじゅつかん): art gallery
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You see an angel go drop something outside your house. You run over and realize it's art. That angel is going around dropping framed art out of the sky and onto the people of earth!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Of course an angel will go drop art everywhere. Why do you think so much art is of angels and naked baby angels and angels punching humans? Because it's all art they made of themselves!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You didn't ask for this art so you try to throw it back up into the sky at the angel. It doesn't like that (why would it?), and flies down to fight you. Too bad you didn't know that angels aren't just good at art. They're also trained in the art of ninjutsu (じゅつ)!!!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Now you're artfully getting your arse kicked by the ninjutsu of this angry angel!
Ru_Meaning: art, technique, skill, means, trick, resources, magic
Ru_Radicals: 丶 (капля), 十 (десять), 彳 (шаг), 木 (дерево), 行 (идти)

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Nothing more common than a piece of art depicting a tree with a little bird that looks like a drop sitting on top of it.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Xing ", " Surgery " sound. The original meaning is the road in the city, generally refers to the road. "Shuowen": "Skills, the road in the city. Follow the line, the sound of the operation." Such as "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. "Legal Questions and Answers" Jane 101: "Thieves kill and injure people." The organizer's note: "Redness, see "Mozi: Prepare the City Gate", which means avenue." It means that thief kills and injures people on the avenue. Another example is "Selected Works. Zuo Taichong "Shu Du Fu": "There is also a first class, as Qu Xiangshu." Liu Kui's note: "shu, Dao."

" Technology " means method and strategy. Such as "Xunzi. Honor and Disgrace: "Benevolence, righteousness and virtue are the art of Chang'an, but it may not be safe." "Lv Shi Chun Qiu. Filial Piety": "A husband who holds the same skill and achieves the best of all virtues and all evils, and who follows the world, is only filial."

" Skill " also specifically refers to the schemes and methods used by the monarch to control his subjects. Such as "Pipe. "Renfa": "Therefore, the Lord has three tricks: husbands and lovers do not privately reward, and the wicked do not privately punish, and the Lord is also the one who tries to measure the judgment." "Han Feizi. The Foreign Reserve said the lower right": "If the owner does not practice skills, he will be less powerful and the minister is good at fame."

" Art " means art, technology. Such as "Mencius. "Gongsun Chou": "Anyone is afraid of not hurting others, and a letter is afraid of hurting others. The same is true for wizards, so the tricks must not be careless." "Han Feizi. "Yu Lao": "The son teaches me to imperial, but the skills are not yet exhausted?"

" Shu " means thought and doctrine. Such as "Historical Records. "Family Family": "The Queen Mother Dou likes Huang Di, Lao Zi Yan, the emperor and the prince Zhu Dou had to read "Yellow Emperor", "Lao Zi", respect her skills." "Lun Heng. "Bomb Burial": "The Mohist's argument is self-violating its tricks, and its thin burial is a ghost."

" Shu " means alchemy and number. Such as "Huainanzi. "Human World": "The people near the fort have good skills, and the horse dies for no reason and enters Hu, and everyone hangs it." "Han Shu. Sui Liang Xia Hou Jingyi Li Chuan": "Wuzhe earthquake Beihai, Langxie, damaging the ancestral temple, I am very afraid of Yan. He and Liehou, the middle two thousand stone scholar warlock, have to adapt to make up for my fault, no Taboo."
humanum_short_description_en: From " Xing ", " Shu " sound. The original meaning is the road in the city, generally refers to the road.
humanum_full_description:
從「行」，「朮」聲。本義是城邑中的道路，泛指道路。《說文》：「術，邑中道也。从行，朮聲。」如《睡虎地秦簡．法律答問》簡101：「有賊殺傷人衝術。」整理者注：「衝術，見《墨子．備城門》，意為大道。」意謂有賊人在大道上殺傷人。又如《文選．左太沖〈蜀都賦〉》：「亦有甲第，當衢向術。」劉逵注：「術，道也。」

　　「術」表示方法、策略。如《荀子．榮辱》：「仁義德行，常安之術也，然而未必不危也。」《呂氏春秋．孝行》：「夫執一術而百善至、百邪去、天下從者，其惟孝也。」

　　「術」又特指君主控制臣下的權謀、手段。如《管子．任法》：「故主有三術：夫愛人不私賞也，惡人不私罰也，置儀設法以度量斷者，上主也。」《韓非子．外儲說右下》：「人主者不操術，則威勢輕而臣擅名。」

　　「術」表示技藝、技術。如《孟子．公孫丑上》：「矢人惟恐不傷人，函人惟恐傷人。巫匠亦然，故術不可不慎也。」《韓非子．喻老》：「子之教我御，術未盡也？」

　　「術」表示思想、學說。如《史記．外戚世家》：「竇太后好黃帝、老子言，帝及太子諸竇不得不讀《黃帝》、《老子》，尊其術。」《論衡．薄葬》：「墨家之議，自違其術，其薄葬而又右鬼。」

　　「術」表示方術、術數。如《淮南子．人間》：「近塞上之人有善術者，馬無故亡而入胡，人皆弔之。」《漢書．眭兩夏侯京翼李傳》：「曩者地震北海、琅邪，壞祖宗廟，朕甚懼焉。其與列侯、中二千石博問術士，有以應變，補朕之闕，毋有所諱。」
humanum_short_description: 從「行」，「朮」聲。本義是城邑中的道路，泛指道路。

術字的基本解释

術
shù
见“术1”。

術字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shù］
［《廣韻》食聿切，入術，船。］
“术4”的繁体字。
(1)道路。
(2)方法；手段。
(3)特指君主控制和使用臣下的策略、手段。
(4)权术；计谋。
(5)技艺；业术。
(6)思想；学说。
(7)方术。指医、卜、星、相等术艺。
(8)学习；效法。
(9)通“述”。遵循，依照。
(10)通“述”。记述，陈述。
(11)通“殺”。等级。
(12)通“聿”。用于句首或句中，表示语气。参见“術追”。
(13)姓。
[②]［suì］
［《集韻》徐醉切，去至，邪。］
“术5”的繁体字。通“遂1”。
(1)古代行政区划。
(2)小沟。
(3)隧道。见“術2數”。
(4)谓顺性。
(5)见“術2術”。

術字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【行字部】　術； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1109第12
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?食律切，音秫。【廣韻】技術也。【人物志】思通造化，策謀奇妙，是爲術家。　又心術。【漢書註】師古曰：述，道徑也，心之所由也。【禮·樂記】心術形焉。又道也。【晏子·雜下篇】言有文章，術有條理。　又業也。【禮·儒行】營道同術。　又【說文】邑中道也。【管子·度地篇】百家爲里，里十爲術，術十爲州。【左思·蜀都賦】亦有甲第，當衢向術。　又【博雅】迹也。　又與述通。【禮·祭義】結諸心，形諸色，而術省之。【註】術當爲述。　又與沭通。【史記·建元以來侯者年表】術陽侯建德。【索隱曰】在下邳。　又【集韻】徐醉切，音燧。六鄕之外地。一曰道也，通作遂。【禮·學記】術有序。【註】術當爲遂。【周禮·地官】萬二千五百家爲遂。

考證：〔【史記·建元侯年表】術陽侯建德。〕　謹照原書改史記建元以來侯者年表。

["Guangyun" Shiyu cut, enter surgery, boat. ]
Traditional characters of "术4".
(1) Road.
(2) Methods; means.
(3) It specifically refers to the strategies and methods used by the monarch to control and use his subordinates.
(4) Power tricks; tactics.
(5) Skills; Karma.
(6) Thought; doctrine.
(7) Alchemy. Refers to the arts of medicine, divination, star, etc.
(8) Study; imitate.
(9) Same as "Said". Follow, follow.
(10) Same as "Said". Narrate, state.
(11) Through "killing". grade.
(12) Through "Yu". Used at the beginning of a sentence or in a sentence to express the tone. See "surgery chase".
(13) Last name.

Name meaning

shù
вм. 术
Radicals: 行, ホ, 丶  (go, angel, drop)
Meaning Mnemonic
You see an angel go drop something outside your house. You run over and realize it's art. That angel is going around dropping framed art out of the sky and onto the people of earth!
Of course an angel will go drop art everywhere. Why do you think so much art is of angels and naked baby angels and angels punching humans? Because it's all art they made of themselves!
Reading Mnemonic
You didn't ask for this art so you try to throw it back up into the sky at the angel. It doesn't like that (why would it?), and flies down to fight you. Too bad you didn't know that angels aren't just good at art. They're also trained in the art of ninjutsu (じゅつ)!!!
Now you're artfully getting your arse kicked by the ninjutsu of this angry angel!
